author: cmpilato
msg: Move the get-locations fallback code (which attempts to use get-logs
to do the same thing) into the RA layer proper.
I tested this by temporarily forcing the svn_ra_get_locations()
function to defer to svn_ra__locations_from_log().  This produced a
single test error (history-tests #1).  But upon reverting my code and
tweaking svn_client__repos_locations() to use the slow_locations()
fallback code, I got the same failure.  In other words, to my
knowledge, I introduced no new errors in the compatability code.
(svn_ra_get_locations): Remove note about older servers returning
New file, with bits moved and refactored from libsvn_client/ra.c.
(svn_ra_get_locations): If the specific RA plugin claims not to
support the get-locations logic, use the fallback code based on
will be short-lived (but at any rate, this code doesn't change
comment noting the duplication with libsvn_ra/compat.c:prev_log_path().

author: ehu
msg: Fix issue #2920 (svn diff doesn't ignore all eols).
copied to output buffer yet' condition, eliminating
the need to increase 'buf' with 'start' when start
points to the beginning of the buffer (as we won't
be using that check anymore later on...)
for changed eol style with empty lines.
